Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-49178 affecting package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland for versions less than 24.1.6-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-49178 affecting package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland for versions less than 24.1.6-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package xorg-x11-server-Xwayland is earlier than 24.1.6-2, affected by CVE-2025-49178
